titlestmt.titleproper: Miscellaneous collections from the New York Public Library Manuscript Divison

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on 2023-04-06 17:16:42 -0400.

did.unittitle: Miscellaneous collections from the New York Public Library Manuscript Divison

origination.label: Creator
origination.corpname: New York Public Library. Manuscript Division

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: The Archives of American art does not own the original papers. Use is limited to the microfilm copy.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Primarily single-item collections consisting of letters, sketches and printed material from or about American artists, or art-related topics.

altformavail.head: Existence and Location of Copies
altformavail.p: 35mm microfilm reels N1-N3 available for use at Archives of American Art offices and through interlibrary loan.

originalsloc.head: Existence and Location of Originals
originalsloc.p: Originals in the New York Public Library, Manuscript Division.

acqinfo.head: Immediate Source of Acquisition
acqinfo.p: Microfilmed 1956 by the Archives of American Art with other art-related papers in the Manuscript Division of the New York Public Library. Included in the microfilming project were selected papers of the Art Division and the Prints Division.

otherfindaid.head: Other Finding Aids
otherfindaid.p: Finding aid available at Archives of American Art offices.
